Draft Rating:

F

Troy Weaver ranks in the 5th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Weaver's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 17 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:

Some of their biggest busts:

  • Drafted Cade Cunningham with 1th pick but was worth 37th pick.
  • Drafted Jaden Ivey with 5th pick but was worth 44th pick.
